title: FM condoles death of ex MNA, Saraiki scholar
content:
MULTAN, Jun 03 (APP):Foreign Minister, Shah Mahmood Hussain Qureshi, condoled death of Ex MNA, Sheikh Tahir Rasheed and Saraiki scholar, Prof Shaukat Mughal here on Wednesday
In a condolence message, he stated that passing away of Sheikh Tahir Rasheed and Saraiki scholar,Prof Shaukat Mughal, was a great loss for the region.
He said the services render by both of them for people of the region would be remembered for long.
Mr Qureshi expressed his heart felt feelings to bereaved families and prayed for their forgiveness.
